Params: {3: 'Deep in the cosmos, stars scatter across the infinite void.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Phew—Finally back! Nanami thinks the enemies in the simulations are getting tougher and tougher.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Will there be even stronger enemies ahead?', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm... Maybe! Just to be safe, let\'s feed our "The Big Eater" some more plugins!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami operates the screen of "The Big Eater", opening the variable settings interface to equip her simulation avatar with all sorts of gear.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right! With these little buddies, Nanami will be more powerful in the simulations.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Nanami speaks, she inputs the commands to construct the next world on the screen.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'How was your rest, Commandant? Ready to head out again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, to get out of here, we have to keep running these simulations over and over?', 3: '15', 4: "Let's go.", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yup! The simulation anchor points are really unstable right now, with all sorts of messy timelines tangled together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Let\'s call these branching worlds "Dimension Domains", shall we?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '"The Big Eater" will gradually filter out the corrupted Dimension Domains through Nanami and Commandant\'s adventures.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'As long as Nanami and Commandant keep running these simulations, "The Big Eater" will definitely stabilize the anchor points and help us find our way out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'World construction complete. Spaceship "The Big Eater", ignition protocol ready—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Toward the Star of Hope in the galaxy—let's blast off!", 4: '1'}
